mapper.select: SELECT B.*, CS.category_m_id, CS.category_s, CM.category_m, s_storename FROM B, S, CATEGORY_M CM, CATEGORY_S CS WHERE b_s_id = s_id AND b_category_s_id = category_s_id AND CS.category_m_id = CM.category_m_id AND B_ISBN = #{isbn} AND B_S_ID = #{sellerId}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT B_ISBN) FROM BOOK WHERE UPPER(B_TITLE) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{keyword} || '%')
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT B_ISBN) FROM BOOK WHERE b_category_s_id = #{category_s_id}
SELECT B.*, S.s_storename FROM B, S WHERE B.b_s_id = S.s_id AND B.b_isbn = #{isbn} ORDER BY B.b_price ASC

SELECT CATEGORY_S, B_TITLE, B_AUTHOR, B_SALESTOCK, B_RENTALSTOCK FROM BOOK INNER JOIN CATEGORY_S ON BOOK.B_CATEGORY_S_ID = CATEGORY_S.CATEGORY_S_ID WHERE B_S_ID = 'seller001'
AND UPPER(CATEGORY_S.CATEGORY_S) = UPPER(#{keyword})
AND UPPER(B_TITLE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%'
AND UPPER(B_AUTHOR) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE B SET b_salestock = b_salestock - #{cart_amount} WHERE b_s_id = #{cart_s_id} AND b_isbn = #{cart_b_isbn}
UPDATE B SET b_rentalstock = b_rentalstock - 1 WHERE b_s_id = #{cart_s_id} AND b_isbn = #{cart_b_isbn}
